questions.question: What is the main limitation of the Random Search Algorithm in graph search?

answers.a: It can only be applied to graphs with few nodes
answers.c: It does not guarantee finding an optimal solution
answers.d: It only works with directed graphs

questions.question: Can the Random Search Algorithm be combined with other search algorithms?

answers.a: No, it can only be used on its own
answers.c: It depends on the specific problem being solved
answers.d: Only with other heuristic search algorithms

questions.question: What is the main disadvantage of using Random Search in graph search?

answers.a: It can be very slow for large graphs
answers.b: It can get stuck in local optima
answers.c: It can only find solutions for certain types of optimization problems
answers.d: It can only be used on undirected graphs

questions.question: Can the Random Search Algorithm be used to solve a traveling salesman problem?
Which of the following is a disadvantage of using Random Search for function optimization?

answers.a: It guarantees finding the global optimum
answers.c: It may not converge to a good solution
answers.d: It can only optimize functions with a small number of variables
